olac.title: Apalaí Phrase Structure: A Preliminary Analysis
olac.creator: Koehn, Edward H.
olac.publisher: Associação Internacional de Linguística, SIL – Brasil
olac.description: The Apalaí phrase comprises a class of constructions which are more than a single word and potentially less than a clause. There are several main phrase types which differ according to their internal structure and their distribution within the clause. The scope of this paper is the description of Apalaí phrase structures and the function of the phrase within a clause.
